alert.note: Alert for Northern Cook, Northern Lake; Southern Cook, North Shore; Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 21 at 2:57AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Cook and east central Lake Counties through 330 AM CDT... At 257 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Boundary Waters Canoe Area Wilderness, to Little Marais, to 13 miles north of Sand Island, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Little Marais around 300 AM CDT. Sugar Loaf Cove around 310 AM CDT. Taconite Harbor around 315 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Tofte and Lutsen. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Northern Cook, Northern Lake; Southern Cook, North Shore; Southern Lake, North Shore
